website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a large capacity hot lather machine that doesn't take too long to heat, this one has some features that are user-friendly but also some that are potentially frustrating.
pros: An updated model that heats up in less than 30 minutes and produces rich, thick lather
Some owners find it works well in professional settings
Has a trim design for a machine its size
cons: Dispenses lather somewhat slowly, and tends to clog
Expensive compared to others on our list
